about_the_game:
1 Billion Spells is an Arena Survival game where you fight off hordes of enemies by making your own spells from simple components. No more levelling up fireball from level 7 to level 8! Magic should be expressive, free, intense and chaotic.

Play as a new student of a modern magic academy and master diverse magic styles. Create the most creative, weird and overpowered spells ever!

Key features:

  • Creative spellcrafting: Chain hundreds of components to create unique spells. A fireball that when it hits an enemy it splits into three lasers that explode and leave a damaging area? Sure.

  • Spell slinging action roguelite: Dodge waves of enemies and projectiles to survive and improve your magical spells.

  • Magical Creature Mayhem: Fight through aggressive fairies, animated statues, and singing frogs to protect the academy and reach the boss of each area.

  • Tons of unlocks: Unlock more components for your spells, new characters to play as, and new arenas to fight in to keep growing as a wizard and get your diploma.
